markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=670) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 220 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Alchemist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=1)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=669); Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your advanced alchemy level increases to 7. For every level you gain beyond 12th, your advanced alchemy level increases by 1.
name: Master Alchemy
